channel.title: A java exception error (Jar)
channel.description: Can anyone help me when my friends click the jar I they get a error java exception error, dose anybody no how to fix this.

item.title: A java exception error (Jar)
item.dc:creator: @lardain lardain
item.description:
@lardain wrote:

I somehow got this error someday aswell. Than i compiled and jarred the client with an older version of jdk and it worked for everyone. I cant tell if it works. But you can always try it. If thats not it you can aswell just make the jar file come with a run.bat to load the jar file. That worked aswel for me.
